name: Mom (hannahkers)
description:
Mom is an interactive story created to explore the themes of loneliness, grief, and growing up.

This game was developed with Twine and it narrates the life of a girl as she navigates through childhood, adolescence, and early adulthood. The story offers multiple choices to deal with and accept grief and explores several difficult themes. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Design and Development by Hannah Hughes (Portfolio)
